text: Va [rūzi qijomat] hamagī dar peşgohi Alloh taolo hozir [-u oşkor] meşavand, pas, [dar in hangom] sitamdidagon ʙa kasone, ki gardankaşī mekardand, megūjand: « Mo [dar dunjo] pajravi şumo ʙudem, pas, ojo [imrūz] metavoned, cize az azoʙi Allohro az mo ʙozdored»? Onon megūjand: «Agar Alloh taolo moro [dar dunjo ʙa sūji rastagorī] rohnamoī mekard, mo niz rohro ʙa şumo nişon medodem. Ci ʙetoʙī kunem jo şikeʙoī namoem, ʙarojamon jakson ast. [Heç] Gurezgohe nadorem»
